html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-02592022-03-24,  PMO,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Directing the Incorporation of a Subsidiary by VIA Rail Canada Inc.
PrecisOrder directing VIA Rail Canada Inc. to (1) procure the incorporation of a wholly-owned subsidiary, yet to be named, the mandate of which is to develop and implement the HIGH FREQUENCY RAIL PROJECT; (2) provide all necessary support, expertise, and co-operation to the subsidiary to facilitate the subsidiary’s role and fulfillment of its mandate; and (3) provide all necessary support, expertise, and co-operation to the Minister of Transport to facilitate the Minister’s role in the development and implementation of the High Frequency Rail project.
AttachmentsAttachment
